alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 5:30PM MST until July 30 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Arizona, including the following county, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 730 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 529 PM MST, the public reported minor flooding in the advisory area due to earlier thunderstorms.Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Casa Grande. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
